P.title: Will Turkey recognize the Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan before 2030?
P.body:
Resolution Criteria
This question will resolve as Yes if, at any point between September 1, 2021 to January 1, 2030, the Turkish government formally recognizes the Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan

Q.title: Will the United States recognize the Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan before 2030?
Q.body:
Resolution Criteria
This question will resolve positively if before 01-01-2030, reliable media sources report that the United States of America has recognized the Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan

P_or_Q.title: Will either Turkey or the United States recognize the Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan before 2030?
P_or_Q.body:
Resolution Criteria
This question will resolve as YES if, at any point between September 1, 2021 to January 1, 2030, either the Turkish government or the United States of America formally recognizes the Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan, as reported by reliable media sources.

Q_or_P.title: Will either the United States or Turkey recognize the Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan before 2030?
Q_or_P.body: This question will resolve as YES if either of the following occurs before January 1, 2030: a.) Reliable media sources report that the United States of America has recognized the Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan. b.) The Turkish government formally recognizes the Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan. Resolves NO otherwise.

P.title: Will Iran recognize the Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan before 2030?
P.body:
Resolution Criteria
This question will resolve as Yes if, at any time between January 1, 2021 to January 1, 2030, the Iranian government formally recognizes the Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan

Q.title: Will Russia recognize the Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan before 2030?
Q.body:
Resolution Criteria
This question will resolve positively if before 01-01-2030, reliable media sources report that the Russian government has recognized the Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan

P_or_Q.title: Will either Iran or Russia recognize the Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan before 2030?
P_or_Q.body: This question will resolve as YES if, at any time between January 1, 2021 to January 1, 2030, either the Iranian government or the Russian government formally recognizes the Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan. It will resolve NO otherwise.

Q_or_P.title: Will either Russia or Iran recognize the Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan before 2030?
Q_or_P.body: This question will resolve as YES if, at any time before January 1, 2030, reliable media sources report that either the Russian government or the Iranian government has formally recognized the Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan. Resolves NO otherwise.

P.title: Will the United States recognize the Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan before 2030?
P.body:
Resolution Criteria
This question will resolve positively if before 01-01-2030, reliable media sources report that the United States of America has recognized the Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan

Q.title: Will Iran recognize the Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan before 2030?
Q.body:
Resolution Criteria

P_or_Q.title: Will either the United States or Iran recognize the Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan before 2030?
P_or_Q.body:
Resolution Criteria
This question will resolve positively if, at any time between January 1, 2021, and January 1, 2030, either the United States of America or the Iranian government formally recognizes the Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan, as reported by reliable media sources.

Q_or_P.title: Will either Iran or the United States recognize the Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan before 2030?
Q_or_P.body: This question will resolve as YES if, at any time between January 1, 2021 to January 1, 2030, either the Iranian government or the United States of America formally recognizes the Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan. It will resolve NO otherwise.
